Directives > ui-pie-chart

ui-pie-chart

Pie Chart with 3 values no color specify


<ui-pie-chart values-set="pieChartData"></ui-pie-chart>

Small pie Chart with 3 values no color specify


<ui-pie-chart values-set="pieChartData" small></ui-pie-chart>

Pie Chart with 7 values but no color specify


<ui-pie-chart values-set="pieChartData1"></ui-pie-chart>

Pie Chart with 7 values and colors


<ui-pie-chart values-set="pieChartData1" color-list="pieChartColor"></ui-pie-chart>

ui-pie-chart Options

Name type default description
values-set array '' A one dimensional array representing the data for the chart
color-list array '' A one dimensional array representing the list of colors used by the chart.
These color are represented as Hex value like '#fcfcfc'
